title: Algorithms to identify palindrome words in list

content.description: Executing which of the following sequences of steps will enable the algorithm to work as intended?
content.question: I. First shorten, then keep palindromes, then sort II. First keep palindromes, then shorten, then sort III. First sort, then keep palindromes, then shorten

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
